measured_by: interval from stimulus onset to EMG onset
justification: “the high signal-to-noise ratio of EMG allows for a reliable decomposition… into two subcomponents: the time from stimulus onset to EMG onset (‘pre-motor time’, PMT)”

measured_by: interval from EMG onset to behavioural response
justification: “…and the time from EMG onset to the behavioral response (‘motor time’, MT)”

measured_by: threshold parameter (boundary separation) in the diffusion model
justification: “the speed-accuracy trade-off… has… been shown to selectively affect the threshold parameter, which governs the amount of evidence accumulated… before they trigger a response”

measured_by: accumulation rate (drift rate) parameter in the diffusion model
justification: “manipulations of stimulus information quality are expected to selectively affect the accumulation rate”

measured_by: Ter (non-decision time) parameter in the diffusion model
justification: “manipulations of response execution are expected to selectively affect the Ter parameter”
